definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: Mr. Muir of Victoria, Canada visited Daqingshan with his Taiji group.
sentences.chinese: 加拿大維多利亞太極拳團由戈登先生帶領訪問大青山。

sentences.english: Wang Zhaojun tomb below Daqing mountain was once called Qing tomb.
sentences.chinese: 大青山腳下的昭君墓被稱爲青冢。

sentences.english: Daqingshan break through the famous battle that occurred here.
sentences.chinese: 著名的大青山突圍戰即發生於此。

definition: Dragon mountain/Longshan district of Liaoyuan city 遼源市|辽源市, Jilin/Longshan county in Xiangxi Tujia and Miao autonomous prefecture 湘西土家族苗族自治州[Xiang1 xi1 Tu3 jia1 zu2 Miao2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1]
Wulan county in Haixi Mongol and Tibetan autonomous prefecture 海西蒙古族藏族自治州[Hai3 xi1 Meng3 gu3 zu2 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Qinghai
Yan mountain range across north Hebei
northern mountain/refers to Mt Mang 邙山 at Luoyang in Henan
Chinese name for Sichote-Alin mountain range in Russia's Primorsky Krai around Vladivostok
Daxing'anling mountain range in northwest Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1] in northeast China/Daxing'anling prefecture
